events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The reported problem has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
A customer service representative has been assigned to handle the refund inquiry.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I will assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product that arrived at my address.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund within 3-5 business days and you may keep the incorrect item.
I appreciate the quick response and that I donâ€™t have to return the item. Thank you for resolving this so smoothly.
The refund initiation has been confirmed, and you should see the amount credited to your account shortly.
We are following up to ensure you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was successfully processed and no further issues were reported, this case is now closed.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. Your feedback would be greatly appreciated.
